channel.title: CrackMe #1 [C#]
channel.description:
Hello guys,
this is my first CrackMe so dont except much. It quite simple to crack since there is no obfuscation involved here. But maybe i could add that later :) The Program consists of two parts. The CrackMe1.exe and the License.dll.
Your goals are:
- to write a keygen (really really easy) - to patch the programm so that you can enter anything and it says "License key valid"
Rules: Dont modify the CrackMe1.exe in any Way! You can decompile to see what it does but dont change anything inside of it.
Have fun!
Downlaod: https://mega.nz/#!2QoTgBSD!h6sdjQDhZAbV1REUychAZ7QVdS5Q67Og4-cM5ceU8BY Virustotal for the .exe: https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/96979226822e7b88e0c9cd058ed51c5a2dfcdeeb7e8974e09f08bc0446a4a4b4/detection (idk where this detection comes from)
Virustotal for the .dll: https://www.virustotal.com/#/file-analysis/NTEyODBkOTZkMTg5N2I5NGYwNjFiZjViMTlmYTM0MDk6MTUyNTYyNTg3Nw==

Cool! I spent 30 secs on flag1 and then spent 10 mins on flag2 but eventually find out that was only spoiler

item.title: CrackMe #1 [C#]
item.dc:creator: pry0cc
item.description:
Hey @GGen!

Congrats on solving this

Quick tip: on 0x00sec you can actually also use the [spoiler] something spoilery [/spoiler] format to conceal information. I noticed you found your own creative way to do it - but this is how we normally do it.

Read full topic

item.title: CrackMe #1 [C#]
item.dc:creator: Geilokowski
item.description:
Hello guys,

this is my first CrackMe so dont except much. It quite simple to crack since there is no obfuscation involved here. But maybe i could add that later The Program consists of two parts. The CrackMe1.exe and the License.dll.

Your goals are:

  • to write a keygen (really really easy)
  • to patch the programm so that you can enter anything and it says “License key valid”

Rules:
Dont modify the CrackMe1.exe in any Way! You can decompile to see what it does but dont change anything inside of it.

Have fun!

Downlaod: https://mega.nz/#!2QoTgBSD!h6sdjQDhZAbV1REUychAZ7QVdS5Q67Og4-cM5ceU8BY
Virustotal for the .exe: https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/96979226822e7b88e0c9cd058ed51c5a2dfcdeeb7e8974e09f08bc0446a4a4b4/detection (idk where this detection comes from)

Virustotal for the .dll: https://www.virustotal.com/#/file-analysis/NTEyODBkOTZkMTg5N2I5NGYwNjFiZjViMTlmYTM0MDk6MTUyNTYyNTg3Nw==
